org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver

类 HeapMemoryManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.HeapMemoryManager

  • @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class HeapMemoryManager
extends Object
    Manages tuning of Heap memory using HeapMemoryTuner. Most part of the heap memory is split between Memstores and BlockCache. This manager helps in tuning sizes of both these dynamically, as per the R/W load on the servers.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static interface  HeapMemoryManager.HeapMemoryTuneObserver
      Every class that wants to observe heap memory tune actions must implement this interface.
      private class  HeapMemoryManager.HeapMemoryTunerChore 
      static class  HeapMemoryManager.TunerContext
      POJO to pass all the relevant information required to do the heap memory tuning.
      static class  HeapMemoryManager.TunerResult
      POJO which holds the result of memory tuning done by HeapMemoryTuner implementation.
